汸汸汸
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 水, 方, 騯
Связанный символ (и): вода, квадрат, 騯

汸字的基本解释

汸
fāng
〔汸水〕古河名。
并船。

汸
pāng
〔汸汸〕形容水势浩大，如“则货财浑浑如泉涌，汸汸如河海。”

汸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fāng］
［《廣韻》府良切，平陽，非。］
(1)古水名。
(2)通“方”。
[②]［pāng］
［《洪武正韻》普郎切，平陽］
同“滂1”。
水盛貌。

汸字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　汸； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页608第11
【唐韻】府良切【集韻】分房切，?音方。倂船也。【說文】本作方，或从水作汸。　又【集韻】敷方切，音芳。與淓同。水名也。【山海經】箕尾之山，汸水出焉，南流注于淯。【註】音芳。　又符方切，音房。義同。　又【正韻】普郞切，音滂。與滂同。【荀子·富國篇】汸汸如河海。

汸字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
汸字的起名意思

形容水势浩大。古河名，汸水。

Yang
Basic explanation of words
Yang
fāng
[Chenshui] The name of the ancient river.
And ship.
Yang
pāng
〔汸汸〕Describes the vast water potential, such as "the muddy goods and wealth are like springs, and the rivers are like rivers and seas."
Yang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fāng］
["Guangyun" Fu Liangqie, Pingyang, Fei. ]
(1) Ancient water name.
(2) Link "Fang".
[②]［pāng］
["Hongwu Zhengyun" Pulangche, Binh Duong]
Same as "Peng 1".
The water is full of beauty.
Yang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　汸; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 608 to 11
【Tang Yun】Fu Liang cut 【Ji Yun】divided into rooms, with sound squares. The boat is also. [Said the text] This is a recipe, or a river from the water.　[Jiyun] Applying square cutting, sound fragrant. Same as Chu. The name of the water is also. [Shanhaijing] The mountain of Jiwei, the river flows out of Yan, and the south flows into Luo. [Note] Yinfang.　Fangqie again, Sound Room. The same meaning.　[Zheng Yun] Pu Yun cut, sound boom. Same as Pang. [Xunzi·Fu Guo Chapter] Lulu is like rivers and seas.
Yang

Name meaning
Describe the huge water potential. The name of the ancient river, Xishui.
